category.description: Information pertaining to a single data category.

urn.description: The org-wide unique identifier for the data category, defined using a period-delimited taxonomical structure (meaning that if we have an urn A.B.C, its parent is A.B, and its parent must exist).

label.description: A UI-friendly label for the data category.

description.description: A human-readable description of the data category.
examples: An email address that can be used to contact a subject.
A social security number that can be used to identify a subject.
An unique identifier that can be used to identify a subject.

items.description: Business-specific example of an entity that falls under this category.

includes.description: Ordered list of examples of entities that fall under this category.

items.description: Business-specific example of an entity that does not fall under this category.

excludes.description: Ordered list of examples of entities that do not fall under this category.

schema.description: The URI schema version for this data

categories.description: List data categories that are relevant to the organization.

description: Definitions of the data categories that are used in the organization.
title: Data Category Definitions
